content:
As a result of combat work on the night of March 18, 2024, 17 of the 22 strikes were shot.

About thisThe morning of March 18 reportedAir Force of the Armed Forces.

Shahmed were launched from the area of the city of Primorsko-Akhtarsk, in the Krasnodar region of the Russian Federation. As a result of combat work, 17 "Shahmed" within the limits of Kyiv, Poltava, Khmelnitsky, Cherkasy, Kirovograd, Dnipropetrovsk, Vinnytsia, Zaporizhzhya, Rivne regions.

In addition, the enemy attacked 5 anti-aircraft guided missiles C-300/C-400 in Kharkiv region, two controlled aviation missiles X-59 in Sumy region.

Air Air Force and Land Forces, Mobile Fire Groups of Defense Forces of Ukraine, radio electronic struggle were involved in the reflection of the air attack.

BeforeThe Armyinform reported14 Shahaneda was shot down in Odesa region.
title: Defense forces knocked down 17 out of 22 Shahmed
description: This was reported on the morning of March 18 by the Armed Forces. Shakhda was running out of the area ...
author: Army Inform
